00131 /**
00132  * cvmx_mpi_cfg
00133  *
00134  * This register provides configuration for the MPI/SPI interface. Note that some of the MPI/SPI
00135  * pins are multiplexed with UART and BOOT pins.
00136  * SPI_CK MPI/SPI clock; dedicated pin.
00137  * SPI_DI MPI/SPI input; shared with UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI; enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1.
00138  * SPI_DO MPI/SPI output; mux to UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO; enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1.
00139  * SPI_CSn_L MPI/SPI output chip select; enabled when MPI_CFG[ENABLE]=1 and MPI_CFG[CSENAn]=1.
00140  */
00141 union cvmx_mpi_cfg {
00142     uint64_t u64;
00143     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_s {
00144 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00145     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00146     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13; /**< Fspi_clk = Fsclk / (2 * CLKDIV)                    |          NS
00147                                                          CLKDIV = Fsclk / (2 * Fspi_clk) */
00148     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS3_L enable:
00149                                                          0 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is UART pin.
00150                                                          1 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00151                                                          SPI_CS3_L drives UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L. */
00152     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS2_L enable:
00153                                                          0 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is UART pin.
00154                                                          1 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00155                                                          SPI_CS2_L drives UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L. */
00156     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;  /**< If 0, BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is BOOT pin       |          NS
00157                                                          1, BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is SPI pin
00158                                                             SPI_CS1_L drives BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L */
00159     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;  /**< If 0, BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is BOOT pin       |          NS
00160                                                          1, BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is SPI pin
00161                                                             SPI_CS0_L drives BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L */
00162     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_CS asserts 1/2 SCLK before transaction   |          NS
00163                                                             1, SPI_CS assert coincident with transaction
00164                                                          NOTE: This control apply for 2 CSs */
00165     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO pin is driven when slave is not       |          NS
00166                                                                expected to be driving
00167                                                             1, SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00168                                                          NOTE: only used when WIREOR==1 */
00169     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;  /**< Guarantee IDLECLKS idle sclk cycles between        |          NS
00170                                                          commands. */
00171     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;  /**< If 0, CS is low asserted                           |          NS
00172                                                          1, CS is high asserted */
00173     uint64_t csena                        : 1;  /**< If 0, the MPI_CS is a GPIO, not used by MPI_TX
00174                                                          1, CS is driven per MPI_TX intruction */
00175     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;  /**< If 0, polling is required                          |          NS
00176                                                          1, MPI engine interrupts X end of transaction */
00177     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;  /**< If 0, shift MSB first                              |          NS
00178                                                          1, shift LSB first */
00179     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO and SPI_DI are separate wires (SPI)   |          NS
00180                                                                SPI_DO pin is always driven
00181                                                             1, SPI_DO/DI is all from SPI_DO pin (MPI)
00182                                                                SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00183                                                          NOTE: if WIREOR==1, SPI_DI pin is not used by the
00184                                                                MPI engine */
00185     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;  /**< If 0, clock idles to value given by IDLELO after   |          NS
00186                                                             completion of MPI transaction
00187                                                          1, clock never idles, requires CS deassertion
00188                                                             assertion between commands */
00189     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_CLK idles high, 1st transition is hi->lo |          NS
00190                                                          1, SPI_CLK idles low, 1st transition is lo->hi */
00191     uint64_t enable                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO, UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI       |          NS
00192                                                             BOOT_CE_N<7:6>/SPI_CSx_L
00193                                                             pins are UART/BOOT pins
00194                                                          1, UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO and UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI
00195                                                             pins are SPI/MPI pins.
00196                                                             BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L is SPI pin if CSENA0=1
00197                                                             BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L is SPI pin if CSENA1=1 */
00198 #else
00199     uint64_t enable                       : 1;
00200     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;
00201     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;
00202     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;
00203     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00204     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;
00205     uint64_t csena                        : 1;
00206     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00207     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00208     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;

00210     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;
00211     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;

00214     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00215     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00216 #endif
00217     } s;

00375     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00376     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;
00377     uint64_t reserved_6_6                 : 1;
00378     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00379     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00380     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;
00381     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;
00382     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;
00383     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;
00384     uint64_t reserved_14_15               : 2;
00385     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00386     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00387 #endif
00388     } cn61xx;
00389     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn66xx {
00390 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00391     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00392     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13; /**< Fspi_clk = Fsclk / (2 * CLKDIV)                    |          NS
00393                                                          CLKDIV = Fsclk / (2 * Fspi_clk) */
00394     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is UART pin        |          NS
00395                                                          1, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is SPI pin
00396                                                             SPI_CS3_L drives UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L */
00397     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART0_RTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is UART pin        |          NS
00398                                                          1, UART0_RTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is SPI pin
00399                                                             SPI_CS2_L drives  UART0_RTS_L/SPI_CS2_L */
00400     uint64_t reserved_12_13               : 2;
00401     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_CS asserts 1/2 SCLK before transaction   |          NS
00402                                                             1, SPI_CS assert coincident with transaction
00403                                                          NOTE: This control apply for 4 CSs */
00404     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO pin is driven when slave is not       |          NS
00405                                                                expected to be driving
00406                                                             1, SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00407                                                          NOTE: only used when WIREOR==1 */
00408     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;  /**< Guarantee IDLECLKS idle sclk cycles between        |          NS
00409                                                          commands. */
00410     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;  /**< If 0, CS is low asserted                           |          NS
00411                                                          1, CS is high asserted */
00412     uint64_t reserved_6_6                 : 1;
00413     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;  /**< If 0, polling is required                          |          NS
00414                                                          1, MPI engine interrupts X end of transaction */
00415     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;  /**< If 0, shift MSB first                              |          NS
00416                                                          1, shift LSB first */
00417     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO and SPI_DI are separate wires (SPI)   |          NS
00418                                                                SPI_DO pin is always driven
00419                                                             1, SPI_DO/DI is all from SPI_DO pin (MPI)
00420                                                                SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00421                                                          NOTE: if WIREOR==1, SPI_DI pin is not used by the
00422                                                                MPI engine */
00423     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;  /**< If 0, clock idles to value given by IDLELO after   |          NS
00424                                                             completion of MPI transaction
00425                                                          1, clock never idles, requires CS deassertion
00426                                                             assertion between commands */
00427     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_CLK idles high, 1st transition is hi->lo |          NS
00428                                                          1, SPI_CLK idles low, 1st transition is lo->hi */
00429     uint64_t enable                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO, UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI       |          NS
00430                                                             UART0_RTS_L/SPI_CS2_L, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L
00431                                                             pins are UART pins
00432                                                          1, UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO and UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI
00433                                                             pins are SPI/MPI pins.
00434                                                             UART0_RTS_L/SPI_CS2_L is SPI pin if CSENA2=1
00435                                                             UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L is SPI pin if CSENA3=1 */
00436 #else
00437     uint64_t enable                       : 1;
00438     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;
00439     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;
00440     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;
00441     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00442     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;
00443     uint64_t reserved_6_6                 : 1;
00444     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00445     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00446     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;
00447     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;
00448     uint64_t reserved_12_13               : 2;
00449     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;
00450     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;
00451     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00452     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00453 #endif
00454     } cn66xx;
00455     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn70xx {
00456 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00457     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00458     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13; /**< Fspi_clk = Fsclk / (2 * CLKDIV)
00459                                                          CLKDIV = Fsclk / (2 * Fspi_clk) */
00460     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is UART pin
00461                                                          1, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is SPI pin
00462                                                          SPI_CS3_L drives UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L */
00463     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;  /**< If 0, UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is UART pin
00464                                                          1, UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is SPI pin
00465                                                          SPI_CS2_L drives  UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L */
00466     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;  /**< If 0, BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is BOOT pin
00467                                                          1, BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is SPI pin
00468                                                          SPI_CS1_L drives BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L */
00469     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;  /**< If 0, BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is BOOT pin
00470                                                          1, BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is SPI pin
00471                                                          SPI_CS0_L drives BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L */
00472     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_CS asserts 1/2 SPI clock before transaction.
00473                                                          1, SPI_CS assert coincident with transaction
00474                                                          NOTE: This control apply for 2 CSs */
00475     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO pin is driven when slave is not
00476                                                          expected to be driving
00477                                                          1, SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00478                                                          NOTE: only used when WIREOR==1 */
00479     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;  /**< Guarantee IDLECLKS idle SPI clock cycles between
00480                                                          commands. */
00481     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;  /**< If 0, CS is low asserted
00482                                                          1, CS is high asserted */
00483     uint64_t reserved_6_6                 : 1;
00484     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;  /**< If 0, polling is required
00485                                                          1, MPI engine interrupts X end of transaction */
00486     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;  /**< If 0, shift MSB first
00487                                                          1, shift LSB first */
00488     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;  /**< If 0, SPI_DO and SPI_DI are separate wires (SPI)
00489                                                          SPI_DO pin is always driven
00490                                                          1, SPI_DO/DI is all from SPI_DO pin (MPI)
00491                                                          SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting
00492                                                          NOTE: if WIREOR==1, SPI_DI pin is not used by the
00493                                                          MPI engine */
00494     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;  /**< If 0, clock idles to value given by IDLELO after
00495                                                          completion of MPI transaction
00496                                                          1, clock never idles, requires CS deassertion
00497                                                          assertion between commands */
00498     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;  /**< 0 = SPI_CK idles high, first transition is high-to-low. This mode corresponds to SPI Block
00499                                                          Guide options CPOL = 1, CPHA = 1.
00500                                                          1 = SPI_CK idles low, first transition is low-to-high. This mode corresponds to SPI Block
00501                                                          Guide options CPOL = 0, CPHA = 0. */
00502     uint64_t enable                       : 1;  /**< MPI/SPI master enable.
00503                                                          0 = UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO, UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI,  pins are UART pins.
00504                                                          1 = UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO and UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI pins are MPI/SPI pins.
00505                                                          This bit must be set for CSENA0-3 to operate as MPI/SPI Chip Selects */
00506 #else
00507     uint64_t enable                       : 1;
00508     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;
00509     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;
00510     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;
00511     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00512     uint64_t int_ena                      : 1;
00513     uint64_t reserved_6_6                 : 1;
00514     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00515     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00516     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;
00517     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;
00518     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;
00519     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;
00520     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;
00521     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;
00522     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00523     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00524 #endif
00525     } cn70xx;
00526     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn70xx            cn70xxp1;
00527     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn73xx {
00528 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00529     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00530     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13; /**< Clock divisor.
00531                                                          _ SPI_CK = coprocessor clock / (2 * CLKDIV)
00532                                                          _ CLKDIV = coprocessor clock / (2 * SPI_CK) */
00533     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS3_L enable:
00534                                                          0 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is UART pin.
00535                                                          1 = UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00536                                                          SPI_CS3_L drives UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L. */
00537     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS2_L enable:
00538                                                          0 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is UART pin.
00539                                                          1 = UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00540                                                          SPI_CS2_L drives UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L. */
00541     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS1_L enable:
00542                                                          0 = BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is boot-bus pin.
00543                                                          1 = BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00544                                                          SPI_CS1_L drives BOOT_CE_N<7>/SPI_CS1_L. */
00545     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CS0_L enable:
00546                                                          0 = BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is boot-bus pin.
00547                                                          1 = BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L pin is MPI/SPI pin.
00548                                                          SPI_CS0_L drives BOOT_CE_N<6>/SPI_CS0_L. */
00549     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;  /**< SPI_CSn_L late.
00550                                                          0 = SPI_CSn_L asserts 1/2 SPI_CK cycle before the transaction.
00551                                                          1 = SPI_CSn_L asserts coincident with the transaction. */
00552     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;  /**< Tristate TX. Used only when WIREOR = 1
00553                                                          0 = SPI_DO pin is driven when slave is not expected to be driving.
00554                                                          1 = SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting. */
00555     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;  /**< Idle clocks. When set, guarantees idle SPI_CK cycles between commands. */
00556     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;  /**< SPI_CSn_L high: 1 = SPI_CSn_L is asserted high, 0 = SPI_CSn_L is asserted low. */
00557     uint64_t reserved_5_6                 : 2;
00558     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;  /**< Shift LSB first: 0 = shift MSB first, 1 = shift LSB first. */
00559     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;  /**< Wire-OR DO and DI.
00560                                                          0 = SPI_DO and SPI_DI are separate wires (SPI). SPI_DO pin is always driven.
00561                                                          1 = SPI_DO/DI is all from SPI_DO pin (MPI). SPI_DO pin is tristated when not transmitting.
00562                                                          If WIREOR = 1, SPI_DI pin is not used by the MPI/SPI engine. */
00563     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;  /**< Clock control.
00564                                                          0 = Clock idles to value given by IDLELO after completion of MPI/SPI transaction.
00565                                                          1 = Clock never idles, requires SPI_CSn_L deassertion/assertion between commands. */
00566     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;  /**< Clock idle low/clock invert.
00567                                                          0 = SPI_CK idles high, first transition is high-to-low.
00568                                                          1 = SPI_CK idles low, first transition is low-to-high. */
00569     uint64_t enable                       : 1;  /**< MPI/SPI enable.
00570                                                          0 = UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO, UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI, UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L, UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L
00571                                                          pins are UART pins.
00572                                                          1 = UART0_DTR_L/SPI_DO and UART0_DCD_L/SPI_DI pins are MPI/SPI pins.
00573                                                          UART1_CTS_L/SPI_CS2_L is an MPI/SPI pin if CSENA2 = 1.
00574                                                          UART1_RTS_L/SPI_CS3_L is an MPI/SPI pin if CSENA3 = 1. */
00575 #else
00576     uint64_t enable                       : 1;
00577     uint64_t idlelo                       : 1;
00578     uint64_t clk_cont                     : 1;
00579     uint64_t wireor                       : 1;
00580     uint64_t lsbfirst                     : 1;
00581     uint64_t reserved_5_6                 : 2;
00582     uint64_t cshi                         : 1;
00583     uint64_t idleclks                     : 2;
00584     uint64_t tritx                        : 1;
00585     uint64_t cslate                       : 1;
00586     uint64_t csena0                       : 1;
00587     uint64_t csena1                       : 1;
00588     uint64_t csena2                       : 1;
00589     uint64_t csena3                       : 1;
00590     uint64_t clkdiv                       : 13;
00591     uint64_t reserved_29_63               : 35;
00592 #endif
00593     } cn73xx;
00594     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn73xx            cn78xx;
00595     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn73xx            cn78xxp1;
00596     struct cvmx_mpi_cfg_cn61xx            cnf71xx;
00597 };
00598 typedef union cvmx_mpi_cfg cvmx_mpi_cfg_t;

00640                                                          1, MPI engine is processing a transaction */
00641 #else

00644     uint64_t reserved_2_7                 : 6;

00647 #endif

00700 /**
00701  * cvmx_mpi_tx
00702  */
00703 union cvmx_mpi_tx {
00704     uint64_t u64;
00705     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_s {
00706 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00707     uint64_t reserved_22_63               : 42;
00708     uint64_t csid                         : 2;  /**< Which CS to assert for this transaction            |          NS */
00709     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00710     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;  /**< If 0, deassert CS after transaction is done        |          NS
00711                                                          1, leave CS asserted after transactrion is done */
00712     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00713     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to transmit                        |          NS */
00714     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00715     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to shift (transmit + receive)      |          NS */
00716 #else
00717     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;
00718     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00719     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;
00720     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00721     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;
00722     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00723     uint64_t csid                         : 2;
00724     uint64_t reserved_22_63               : 42;
00725 #endif
00726     } s;
00727     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn30xx {
00728 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00729     uint64_t reserved_17_63               : 47;
00730     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;  /**< If 0, deassert CS after transaction is done
00731                                                          1, leave CS asserted after transactrion is done */
00732     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00733     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to transmit */
00734     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00735     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to shift (transmit + receive) */
00736 #else
00737     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;
00738     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00739     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;
00740     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00741     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;
00742     uint64_t reserved_17_63               : 47;
00743 #endif
00744     } cn30xx;
00745     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn30xx             cn31xx;
00746     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn30xx             cn50xx;
00747     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn61xx {
00748 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00749     uint64_t reserved_21_63               : 43;
00750     uint64_t csid                         : 1;  /**< Which CS to assert for this transaction            |          NS */
00751     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00752     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;  /**< If 0, deassert CS after transaction is done        |          NS
00753                                                          1, leave CS asserted after transactrion is done */
00754     uint64_t reserved_13_15               : 3;
00755     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to transmit                        |          NS */
00756     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00757     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to shift (transmit + receive)      |          NS */
00758 #else
00759     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;
00760     uint64_t reserved_5_7                 : 3;
00761     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;

00763     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;
00764     uint64_t reserved_17_19               : 3;
00765     uint64_t csid                         : 1;
00766     uint64_t reserved_21_63               : 43;
00767 #endif
00768     } cn61xx;
00769     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_s                  cn66xx;
00770     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn70xx {
00771 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00772     uint64_t reserved_63_22               : 42;
00773     uint64_t csid                         : 2;  /**< Which CS to assert for this transaction */
00774     uint64_t reserved_19_17               : 3;
00775     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;  /**< If 0, deassert CS after transaction is done
00776                                                          1, leave CS asserted after transactrion is done */
00777     uint64_t reserved_15_13               : 3;
00778     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to transmit */
00779     uint64_t reserved_7_5                 : 3;
00780     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;  /**< Number of bytes to shift (transmit + receive) */
00781 #else
00782     uint64_t totnum                       : 5;
00783     uint64_t reserved_7_5                 : 3;
00784     uint64_t txnum                        : 5;
00785     uint64_t reserved_15_13               : 3;
00786     uint64_t leavecs                      : 1;
00787     uint64_t reserved_19_17               : 3;
00788     uint64_t csid                         : 2;
00789     uint64_t reserved_63_22               : 42;
00790 #endif
00791     } cn70xx;
00792     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn70xx             cn70xxp1;
00793     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_s                  cn73xx;
00794     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_s                  cn78xx;
00795     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_s                  cn78xxp1;
00796     struct cvmx_mpi_tx_cn61xx             cnf71xx;
00797 };
00798 typedef union cvmx_mpi_tx cvmx_mpi_tx_t;
00799 
00800 /**
00801  * cvmx_mpi_wide_dat
00802  *
00803  * This register aliases operations to MPI_DAT(0..7) in a single access
00804  *
00805  */
00806 union cvmx_mpi_wide_dat {
00807     uint64_t u64;
00808     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s {
00809 #ifdef __BIG_ENDIAN_BITFIELD
00810     uint64_t data                         : 64; /**< Data to transmit/receive. */
00811 #else
00812     uint64_t data                         : 64;
00813 #endif
00814     } s;
00815     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s            cn70xx;
00816     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s            cn70xxp1;
00817     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s            cn73xx;
00818     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s            cn78xx;
00819     struct cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_s            cn78xxp1;
00820 };
00821 typedef union cvmx_mpi_wide_dat cvmx_mpi_wide_dat_t;
